trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around December 3rd 2011
Summary: woke up at 6:30 am like something asked me to look to the sky and saw a ufo
divs: Sighting Detailsi live in scranton pa in a apartment house on the 3rd floor with 3 big windows where i can see a lot of the sky and the area the windows are facing towards wilkes barre pa and yes i know there is a airport there and i lived right next to the airport so i know the difference between planes landing and taking off ,this morning december 3rd at 6:30 i woke up to something in my head saying look up in the sky and i did just at the wrong direction but then noticed something in the sky flickering in different colors at first it was clear and seemed close so didnt think much of it and then turned back and seen it move to the side a little so i used my window frame to see if the object was moving and yes it was at first really slow to the right so i knew in the matter of 15 minutes a star cannot move by that much and it wasnt a helicopter or airplane iam sure of that it then started moving a little faster i even woke up my mom to witness it and she did see it but not as long as i did because it went behind a big tree that is there and thats where i lost sight of it but i have never seen something like this where it gave of different colors and made me feel all happy to see it i have seen stuff like this before but never with flickering colors like this it went blue green yellow red and not like underneath a plane as a whole sphere giving out the colors i just wish i had my camera working but could not go without at least reporting it to see if someone else maybe seen it iam sorry for the spelling and bad english iam originally from eastern europe but i swear this is no joke and i just want to find out more !
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
